allow:
Bash(git -C /Users/karsten/dev/dotfiles add gitconfig && git -C /Users/karsten/dev/dotfiles commit -m "$\(cat <<'EOF'
Set git user email to real address

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<'EOF'
Add new-project script, dotfiles tmuxinator config, and zshrc alias

- Add new-project.sh for scaffolding new projects with tmuxinator configs and zshrc aliases
- Add tmuxinator/dotfiles.yml for the dotfiles project workspace
- Update zshrc with dotfiles alias \(df\) and include it in start-all
- Update Claude local settings with recent permissions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(for repo in ~/dev/*/; do echo "=== $repo ==="; git -C "$repo" remote -v 2>/dev/null || echo "  \(not a git repo\)"; echo; done)

Bash(git -C ~/dev/dotfiles add .claude/settings.local.json && git -C ~/dev/dotfiles commit -m "$\(cat <<'EOF'
Update Claude local settings with session permissions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
